9.10 Gox Hack Pack for skills v0.32/2
Identical to v0.32 only without Chameleon mod, but with zones of penetration only when aiming at a tank! This mod allow you to use skins with zones of penetration (vulnerable places, the arrangement of the modules and crew) only when aiming at a tank or pressing the hot key ALT.

A Lot of other corrections and configurations
